page.title: 10The Suffolk Show, Kesgrave
page.content:
The Suffolk Show is held every year on the Suffolk Show Ground near Bucklesham Road. This year it was held on Wednesday 29th and Thursday 30th May. There were a lot of stalls, more than last year, and there were more people. It was a record attendance of 84,180 people. It costs 2 Pounds for an adult and 1 Pound 50 for a child. There were lots of new stalls like Radio Orwell and Anglia TV.
The main purpose of the show is farming and agriculture so there were also many pig, sheep, cow and goat pens. There was a bird tent, a rabbit show and a flower show. There were displays connected with energy, houses and cooking with microwaves. The local newspapers also had a stand.
